jobs.title: Special Projects Manager
jobs.description:
About the role:

Tallarium works with a large number of the top commodity trading majors and looks to hire a very bright individual to support wider market rollout later in 2019.

We are looking for a highly organised, logical and analytical individual who can operate fully independently on identifying issues and organising internal resources to solve those

We’re not corporate, we’re a start-up. You will have an exposure to all areas of the business and will be working alongside the CEO to support organisational scaling.

Special projects: any and most strategic projects that are critical to the business and often beyond ‘business as usual’. 
For example: 
Hiring - structure candidate sourcing & recruitment funnel; 
Product management - coordinate work between design, tech & sales; 
Strategy - explore and define which projects the team should prioritise; 
Business Development - enterprise sales process optimization; 
And any other project that requires heavy assistance - high impact, short-deadlines.

What we can promise:
Impact – you will improve the way the energy marketplace operates via better core infrastructure
Development -  be part of scaling the company from late-Seed VC round to Series A and onward; pursue your interests and develop career with us as we grow
Team - work with very smart and bright people in the informal work environment
Ownership – you will be responsible for your work and your impact, but you will get guidance and help

Requirements:
- Strong academic background - top 10 UK university or international alternative, ideally science subject
- 2-5 year experience with top consulting/IB firm 
- start-up/entrepreneurial experience 
- strong interest an/or experience in trading, data & financial markets

About you: 
- Very fast learner with a highly analytical mindset who can solve problems and "get things done" 
- Ability to identify challenges and independently drive project execution to solve them 
- You are reliable: you deliver on what you said you would deliver. 
- Good communicator: you know how to present large amounts of complex information in a succinct manner 
- Highly organized with strong attention to detail 
- Can work well under pressure

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager
jobs.description:
About Tallarium:

Currently over $3tn p.a. energy market operates using outdated tools and technology. Tallarium is a London-based startup building centerpiece SaaS platform for commodity trading.

We are a VC-funded company with the backing of top industry executives, traders and world class-engineering team. Members of our team went to world's best universities and worked at highly successful tech firms.

About the role:

We are looking for a Senior Product Manager, who would take a leading role in driving our trading application to new heights and industry-wide adoption.

Tallarium already works with a number of the top 10 commodity trading majors and your role would be to take product from early adoption to building out enterprise-wide data and trading solution for the whole of the energy market.

We are looking for an exceptional individual to manage the product and be responsible for planning, delivery and implementation of its platform features as well as establishing product management as a function. You will be working closely with the CEO to translate long term business objectives and company vision into best-in-class tech product.

Role requires a highly logical and analytical PM with lateral thinking who can take ownership and organise internal resources for solving user challenges.

What you will be doing:

- Work with CEO & tech team to coordinate new feature implementation and prioritisation
- Write new feature specs for technical development
- Identify product issues, opportunities and new solutions to help clients with their jobs; take full ownership and organize internal resources for project delivery
- Closely work with the CEO on strategic product roadmap
- Responsibility for product roadmap maintenance and timely tech project delivery
- Work with designer on planning and refining product UI/UX and new feature prototypes in line with long term business plan
- Chase users to collect feedback on upcoming and existing functionality, maintain feedback organization; be responsible for organising user meetings
- Develop product management disciple and processes
Manage ad-hoc projects related to product delivery, customer success and operations (as the business requires)

What skills you'll need:

- Must have strong interest in trading, data & financial markets
- Exceptional academic background - top 10 UK university or international alternative, ideally science subject
- Experience as product manager at top tech firm/well-funded startup or alternatively consulting/financial services background
- A solid track record of achievement, where quickly assumed major responsibilities
- Start-up/entrepreneurial experience is highly beneficial
- Great interpersonal skills for liaising with energy trading clients 

About you:

Very fast learner with a highly analytical mindset who can solve problems and "get things done"
Ability to identify challenges and independently drive project execution
You are reliable: you deliver on what you said you would deliver
Good communicator: you know how to present large amounts of complex information in a succinct manner 
Highly organised with strong attention to detail
Can work well under pressure

Benefits:

- Be part of scaling the company from late-Seed VC round to Series A and onward; pursue your interests and develop career with us as we grow
- Flexible working hours
- Private health insurance
- Great centrally located office on Baker street
- Competitive salary & equity
